metadata.title: Key dacoit from home burglary gang nabbed

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 08 (APP):Islamabad Capital Territory (ICT) Policeas Lohi Bher team on Wednesday apprehended a key suspect involved in multiple home burglaries on Wednesday. A public relation officer told APP thatA the accused, identified as Muhammad Asif, was found in possession of stolen cash, a motorcycle, a laptop, and ammunition worth approximately Rs. 9.8 million. He said that during initial investigations, the suspect confessed to committing multiple home burglaries, shedding light on the gangas illicit activities. DIG Syed Ali Raza commended the police team for their efforts and assured citizens that the Islamabad Police will continue its operations against criminals depriving residents of their valuable assets.
content.summary: A key suspect involved in multiple home burglaries was apprehended by Islamabad Capital Territory (ICT) Police.
